steps.text:
Case Records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 25-2014. A 37-year-old 
man with ulcerative colitis and bloody diarrhea.
Hohmann EL, Ananthakrishnan AN, Deshpande V.

A 37-year-old man with ulcerative colitis was admitted to the hospital because 
of abdominal cramping, diarrhea, hematochezia, fever to a peak temperature of 
38.8 °C, and drenching night sweats. Several weeks earlier, he had performed 
home fecal transplantation.
